title.string: Explanation is the term used to describe a spurious relationship.

title.string: When the partial relationship is essentially the same as the original relationship, the term “specification” is applied to the result.
Interpretation only differs from explanation when it comes to the level of measurement used.

Having observed an empirical relationship between two variables, we seek to understand the nature of that relationship through the effects produced by introducing other variables. In view of this, what is the basic form of the elaboration model?

description.string: Explain the purpose of the elaboration model.

What is a replication in the elaboration model? What does it tell you about the relationships uncovered in the original analysis?
